node.title: Hollywood actress Natalie Wood was sexually assaulted by Kirk Douglas in 1955, her sister alleges
node.alt: A black and white photo of actress Natalie Wood smiling.
node.description: In a memoir coming out next week, Natalie Wood's younger sister alleges Kirk Douglas sexually assaulted theÂ Hollywood actress when she was a teenager.
node.content:
["For decades, it's been one of Hollywood's darkest rumours.", "An allegation that teenage Natalie Wood was sexually assaulted by a top movie star more than twice her age when she met with him at a hotel in Los Angeles.", "In a memoir coming out next week, Wood's younger sister identifies the long-suspected assailant: Kirk Douglas", "
Who was Natalie Wood?
", "", "
Natalie Wood and James Dean in the 1955 film Rebel Without a Cause.(IMDb)
", "Natalie Wood was a child actress, best known for the 1947 film\u00a0Miracle on 34th Street,\u00a0who went on to star in some of Hollywood's biggest films at the end\u00a0of its golden age.", "At age 16, her performance in the 1955 film Rebel Without a Cause alongside James Dean earned her an Oscar nomination for best supporting actress.", "She also received Oscar nominations for her leading roles in Splendor in the Grass (1961) and Love with a Proper Stranger (1963).", "But arguably her most enduring legacy is her performance as Maria in the 1961 movie adaptation of Broadway hit West Side Story.", "", "
Richard Beymer and Natalie Wood in the 1961 film\u00a0West Side Story.(IMDb)
", "Wood first married American\u00a0actor\u00a0Robert Wagner in 1957\u00a0and the pair went on to star\u00a0together in the 1960 film All the Fine Young Cannibals.", "They divorced in 1962, and Wood briefly married British film producer Richard Gregson before divorcing him and remarrying Wagner in 1972.", "On November 28, 1981, Wood disappeared from her husband's yacht, which she had been on with Wagner, actor Christopher Walken and the boat captain.", "Wood was found dead\u00a0the next day in waters off California's\u00a0Santa Catalina Island. She was 43.", "Authorities initially ruled her\u00a0death an accidental drowning, but that has changed after years of scrutiny and more witnesses emerging.", "", "
Natalie Wood and husband actor Robert Wagner in 1976.(AFP)
", "
What are the allegations?
", "Lana Wood, Natalie Wood's younger sister, alleges the actress was sexually assaulted by Hollywood superstar Kirk Douglas.", "Douglas, who was in his late 30s at the time of the alleged incident, has been\u00a0long-suspected as the man who had assaulted Wood.", "The\u00a0rumours were so prevalent that when he died in 2020, at age 103, Natalie Wood's name trended along with his on Twitter.", "In her upcoming memoir Little Sister, Lana Wood writes the alleged incident happened in the summer of 1955, when Natalie would have been aged 16 or 17.", "It was around the time Natalie and Lana were\u00a0filming John Wayne movie The Searchers.", "", "
Natalie Wood and younger sister Lana Wood\u00a0in 1956.(IMDb)
", "According to the book, the girls' mother\u00a0Maria Zakharenko dropped Natalie off one night at the entrance of Chateau Marmont, a hotel on Los Angeles's\u00a0Sunset Boulevard.", "The meeting had been arranged by their mother, who thought that \"many doors might be thrown open for her, with just a nod of his famous, handsome head on her behalf\".", "Lana said she remained in the car outside with Maria.", "\"It seemed like a long time passed before Natalie got back into the car and woke me up when she slammed the door shut,\" she writes.", "\"She looked awful. She was very disheveled and very upset, and she and Mom started urgently whispering to each other. I couldn't really hear them or make out what they were saying.", "\"Something bad had apparently happened to my sister, but whatever it was, I was apparently too young to be told about it.\"", "", "
Natalie Wood with her sister Lana in 1963.(AFP)
", "According to Lana Wood, Natalie did not discuss with her what happened until both were adults and Natalie, after describing being brought into Douglas's suite, told her sister: \"And, uh ... he hurt me Lana.\"", "\"It was like an out-of-body experience. I was terrified, I was confused,\" Lana Wood remembers her saying.", "Lana, now 75 and around eight when the alleged incident occurred, remembered her sister and their mother agreeing it would ruin Natalie's career to publicly accuse him. Their mother's advice was \"suck it up\".", "In her book, she recalls promising her sister not to discuss her being assaulted by Douglas, but\u00a0believes enough has changed since her conversation with Natalie that she can now tell the whole story.", "\"With no-one still around to protect, I'm sure she'll forgive me for finally breaking that promise,\" she wrote.", "
Who was Kirk Douglas?
", "", "
Kirk Douglas died in 2020, aged 103.(AP)
", "Kirk Douglas was one of Hollywood's biggest actors.", "He made more than 90 movies during his career, which stretched across seven decades, and is\u00a0best known for his titular role in the 1960 film Spartacus.", "He was also one of the first major actors to form his own production company, Bryna Productions, which was established in 1949.", "Douglas was a\u00a0prominent liberal activist who has been widely credited with helping to break the Cold War blacklist against suspected communists.", "He\u00a0received a Presidential Medal of Freedom in 1981 and the Legion of Honor from France in 1985.", "He was given an honorary Oscar in 1996, when the film academy praised him as \"a creative and moral force\".", "", "
Kirk Douglas in the 1960 film Spartacus.(Supplied: Universal Pictures)
", "Douglas married his second wife\u00a0Anne Buydens in 1954. He had four sons, including actor\u00a0Michael Douglas.", "Douglas himself acknowledged that he was a womaniser and an unfaithful husband.", "Speaking to the Associated Press about Douglas in December 2016, less than a year before the #MeToo movement caught on, actress and dancer Neile Adams lightheartedly said of her friend: \"You could not sit beside him without his hand crawling up your leg\".", "In his memoir The Ragman's Son,\u00a0published in 1988, Douglas writes briefly about Natalie Wood.", "He remembers driving home one night and stopping at a red light. The door of the car in front of him opened and \"a pretty little girl wearing a suede jacket hopped out\" and ran up to him.", "\"'Oh, Mr. Douglas, would you please sign my jacket?'\" he remembers her saying.", "\"As I obliged, the woman who was driving got out and introduced her. 'This is my daughter. She's in movies, too. Her name is Natalie Wood.' That was the first time I met Natalie. I saw her many times afterward, before she died in that cruel accident.\"", "Douglas's son, Michael, said in a statement issued through his publicist: \"May they both rest in peace\".", "", "
Actor Michael Douglas\u00a0kisses his father\u00a0Kirk Douglas during a 2003 photo shoot.(AP: Chris Pizzello, File)
", "ABC/AP"]
